Title: Legacy - Barton Area Rug

Title: Berlin - Drayton Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Reinvigorate your favorite interior space with the rich texture and exciting geometric patterns of the Berlin collection by Amer Rugs. The striking Drayton area rug goes bold with a southwestern-inspired design, rendered in on-trend neutrals for easy coordination with contemporary themes.

  • Each area rug in the Berlin collection is handmade with a dimensional looped texture for patterns that pop.

Title: Vista - Duncan Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embrace modern geometric styling with the Duncan area rug, part of the exceptionally practical Vista collection by Amer Rugs. This handcrafted design showcases the comfort and versatility of New Zealand wool – every piece made with the utmost attention to quality.

  • Choose from three neutral colorways. Each yarn is spun with variegated color for incomparable richness and depth.
  • Duncan features an interlaced trellis pattern, the smooth lines coming together in overlaid diamond motifs for a striking modern look. Each line is rendered in a soft cut pile that stands in tactile contrast to the low looped base.
  • This 100% wool area rug is hand-hooked by skilled artisans. A strong cotton backing adds extra stability for longer lasting durability.
  • Avoid using any type of brush roll or beater bar component while vacuuming this area rug. Use a suction-only setting.

Title: Boscage - Ilford Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embark on a journey through time and tradition with the captivating Boscage Ilford Area Rug by Amer Rugs.

  • This traditional area rug tells a story of craftsmanship with its New England-inspired design. Tribal medallion designs are woven with meticulous precision, and a coordinating, geometric border frames the rug with a flourish of modern flair. Choose between a slate gray or blue color scheme to effortlessly anchor your space.
  • This low pile area rug is a symbol of your appreciation for quality with its durable and practical design. Durability is woven into every fiber of the 100% New Zealand wool area rug.
  • Promising gorgeous, hand-hooked details, this stylish area rug is expertly crafted in India.
  • To keep your area rug looking its best and prolong its lifespan, regularly vacuum it on a low setting, spot-clean any spills immediately, and rotate it periodically to distribute wear evenly.

Flatter your living space with the smooth, soft simplicity of the Raffia Rafaele area rug by Amer Rugs. This versatile selection boasts a soft and comfortable hand, the pile imbued with a diverse palette of color for endless coordination possibilities.

  • Rafaele is available in a range of curated colorways, each one woven with tonal striations that sweep across the surface.
  • Use this low-profile contemporary area rug to underscore your living room seating, to soften your step around the bed, or to lend quiet sophistication to the home office.
  • Each handwoven rug in the Raffia collection boasts the sumptuous softness of New Zealand wool, accented with hints of viscose art silk for a subtle sheen that catches the light.
  • Viscose content rugs perform their best in dry environments. Quickly blot away any spill with a dry white cloth before it has a chance to set.

Style and charm coexist beautifully in the captivating Dune Alliya Area Rug by Amer Rugs.

  • With its artful distressing and intricate details, this modern area rug adds uniqueness and character to your everyday life.   • This flat pile area rug is a versatile addition to any space, promising a soft and durable foundation. With its low profile and subtle texture, this 100% cotton area rug seamlessly blends style and functionality.
  • This exquisite area rug is handmade and flatwoven in India, giving it intricate detail and optimal quality.
  • Vacuum away dried soiling and staining, and arrange for professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug looking clean and fresh.

Title: Vista - Raton Area Rug
Body (HTML):

Body (HTML):
Embark on a journey through time and tradition with the unexpected Empress Kingsley Area Rug by Amer Rugs.

Title: Century - CEN-18 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
For vintage character with a contemporary twist, the whimsical CEN-18 area rug ignites the imagination with delicate floral motifs in handsomely faded tones. This fabulous piece is part of the Century collection by Amer Rugs, a line that reinterprets classic favorites with modern construction.

  • By translating traditional styles with synthetic materials, this area rug allows anyone to enjoy heirloom-quality looks at a reasonable price.
  • Graceful flower designs waltz within the layered outside borders, framing a vision of stately patterns over a field of soothing cobalt blue. A distressed effect lends timeworn charm.
  • This polyester area rug gains its fine level of detail and impressive durability from exacting power-loomed construction.
  • To keep your area rug looking great even longer, vacuum regularly without using the beater bar and spot clean with synthetic-safe rug detergent as needed.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Fairmont - Fiorella Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Classic concepts are deconstructed within the Fairmont collection by Amer Rugs, breaking away from convention to create something new and exciting. The splendid Fiorella area rug captures attention with its complex spectrum of ornament tempered by a distressed vintage overlay.

  • A symphony of color washes over the surface of this whimsical piece - playful notes of red, yellow, orange, and blue.
  • Consider this vintage area rug design as art you can use every day. Use this pop of color and texture to reinvigorate the places where you love to spend most of your time.
  • An excellent level of detail is achieved by modern power-loomed manufacturing. This polyester area rug is durable, easy to maintain, and constructed with a low pile height to aid door clearance.
  • Refresh this area rug as needed by vacuuming with beater bar disengaged. Spot clean with synthetic-safe carpet detergent.
  • Made in Turkey.

With a weathered, vintage look, our Amer Fairmont FAI-2 area rug adds subtle sophistication. Plus, its synthetic construction features a great mix of comfort, durability, and easy care qualities.

  • Thanks to its polyester and polypropylene construction and low profile, this collection is both easy to maintain and incredibly durable.
  • Inspired by vintage floor coverings, this piece boasts a subdued palette of gray, brown, and cream that effortlessly complements traditional, contemporary, and shabby chic settings.
  • Machine-made of a low pile of synthetic yarns, this soft indoor rug offers durability as well.
  • To prolong the lifespan of your rug, rotate your rug every few months, evening out wearing and fading.
  • Made in Turkey.

Title: Maryland - Cecil Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Contemporary flair meets artistic expression in the enigmatic Maryland Cecil Area Rug by Amer Rugs.

Title: Quartz - Desoto Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Pay tribute to the beauty of simplicity with the chic Quartz Desoto Area Rug by Amer Rugs.

  • This modern area rug combines linear and geometric patterns for a tribal-like, unique look. Choose between six neutral, versatile colorway options to breathe new life into your contemporary space.
  • This viscose and New Zealand wool area rug is made of the finest art silk and wool fibers, allowing light to dance across its surface for an ethereal look that complements the soft underfoot feel beautifully. The low pile area rug exudes an unmatched sense of luxury that truly defines sophistication.
  • This versatile, yet completely unique area rug is hand-knotted in India.
  • Using professional cleaning solutions for stain removal will keep your rug looking fresh and stain-free for years to come, but we also recommend professional cleanings on a regular basis.

Contemporary artistry knows no bounds, and the stunning Maryland Abbel Area Rug by Amer Rugs is proof.

  • The multi-directional, linear pattern on this modern area rug echoes a cosmopolitan cityscape, drawing your eye in every direction, while a contrasting and coordinating border adds the perfect amount of structure. Choose between three gorgeous colorway options for a well-coordinated look.
  • This flat pile area rug is a versatile addition to your patio or indoor living space. The robust construction of this 100% polypropylene area rug makes it an ideal choice for high-traffic areas, combining durability with a low-maintenance design.
  • This stylish, indoor/outdoor area rug promises quality and durability, and it is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Professional cleaning is recommended, but spot cleaning and vacuuming on low power will also preserve the beauty and life of this beautiful rug.

Title: Artifacts - Arana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Southwestern textile traditions find fresh expression through the Artifacts collection by Amer Rugs. The stunning Arana area rug is flat-woven from 100% premium wool, lightweight yet strong enough to withstand everyday life.

  • Bold geometric shapes draw inspiration from time-honored regional patterns, streamlined and refined to suit contemporary trends.
  • Such a distinctive Southwestern area rug offers exciting possibilities as an eclectic accent for modern, rustic, and transitional interiors.
  • This flat-woven premium wool rug maintains a sleek low profile that fits easily beneath doors and offers the natural strength to weather casual foot traffic.
  • Take care to avoid vacuuming over fringe edges. When needed, spot clean with cold water as hot water can cause the natural fibers to shrink.
  • Made in India.
